author: seroze1
content: why are we calling eth1 as execution layer ?

author: seroze1
content: this name seems to be a recent change

author: pipermerriam
content: Because after the merge, beacon chain manages consensus and what we previously called eth1 will only need to deal with execution

author: seroze1
content: by execution you mean the `smart contract feature  will be supported by eth1 chain` and rest will be done by ` beacon chain(eth2 chain)`
